thread.section_title: Apartment Therapy | Saving the world, one room at a time
thread.title: How Many of the 10 Best-Selling IKEA Items Do You Own?
thread.title_full: How Many of the 10 Best-Selling IKEA Items Do You Own?

author: Katie Holdefehr
title: How Many of the 10 Best-Selling IKEA Items Do You Own?
text:
Share 
There are some IKEA items that hit stores for a single season and never reappear, and then there are those that remain popular year after year, can be found in 50-percent of all house tours, and that we would 100-percent buy again. A few ubiquitous items pop to mind—the RENS sheepskin, the BILLY bookcase. I always assumed they were the most popular items at the store, but are they really? To figure out what lives on the most-loved list, we asked the Swedish retail giant for their list of their 10 best-selling items. So here they are, in no particular order, the official IKEA classics. BILLY 
Price: Starting at $30 for a 3-shelf unit 
Are we surprised that the BILLY bookcase made the list? Not even a little bit. The beauty of the BILLY is it's remarkably versatile. Choose a simple three-shelf unit, or build an entire library. Adjustable shelves, optional doors and adjustable heights make this series easy to customize—and that's all before we consider these DIY hacks .
